p: Serum superoxide dismutase (SOD, EC1.15.1.1) activity was carried out as described by Misra [ 34]. The enzymatic activity was based on the 50% inhibition rate of epinephrine auto-oxidation at 480 nm. SOD activity was expressed as U/mL. Serum catalase (CAT, EC 1.11.1.6) activity was evaluated by following the decrease in absorbance of H 2O 2 at 240 nm [ 35]. One unit of enzyme activity was defined as the amount of enzyme required to degrade 1 Î¼mol of H 2O 2 in 60 s. CAT activity was expressed as U/mL. Each sample analysis was performed in triplicate.
